segments.text: What do you want to know about me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about your academic records at college ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The average grade of all my courses is above 85 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In which subject did you get the highest marks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have , and three times in total .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you been a class leader ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been a class commissary in charge of studies for two years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you join in any club activities ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was an aerobics team member in college .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What sport are you good at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am good at sprint and table tennis .
segments.speaker: S1
